title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.54 - Removal of abandoned vehicles to be at owner's risk and expense
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.54 - Removal of abandoned vehicles to be at owner's risk and expense

State Regulations

An automotive vehicle abandoned in a truck terminal may
be parked, garaged or stored elsewhere at the risk and expense of the operator. An automotive vehicle shall be deemed to have been abandoned when it is not
removed or claimed by the operator thereof for a period of 10 days if it is
parked in the vehicular parking area of a truck terminal or for a period of 24
hours if it is parked in any area of a truck terminal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.54

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
